# Flowsheet Data Grid with orange column highlighting

### Description

This example demonstrates a basic [Flowsheet Data Grid](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/data-grid/flowsheet-data-grid/about) with orange column highlighting.

Below are the attributes used for column highlighting.
- `isColumnHighlighted` is used here to indicate the column(s) to be highlighted.
- `columnHighlightColor` can be used to set highlight colour to either Orange (default) or Green.
- `columnHighlightDescription` can be used to provide context regarding the highlighted column to screen readers.
